title: Stream: Frank Ocean – Channel Orange
body:
Following a rather hectic past few weeks for Mr **Ocean**, he last night announced that he’d be bringing forward the iTunes release of his new album; _**Channel Orange**_, to tie in with his appearance on Jimmy Fallon.

The BBC Sound of 2012 runner up has already gone some way to cementing his status as a real talent in the R’n’B community, having worked with the likes of **Beyonce**, **Kanye West** and **Jay-Z**. Featuring the previous heard _Sweet LIFE_, _Pyramids_ and _Thinkin’ About You_ as well as guest slots from **John Mayer**, **Andre 3000** and **Earl Sweatshirt**, **_Channel Orange_** is available to stream in it’s entirety below.
